description: Defines a custom Flutter widget 'PrimaryButton' that extends StatelessWidget and provides a styled button with optional icon.

classes.name: PrimaryButton
classes.description: A customizable primary button widget with rounded style and optional icon, intended for use across the UI.

methods.name: PrimaryButton
methods.description: Constructor for creating a PrimaryButton with required label, optional callback, and optional icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the button, displaying an icon and label if icon is provided, otherwise just the label.
